alert.note: Alert for Caddo; Canadian; Greer; Kiowa; Washita (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 19 at 1:10PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Washita, northern Caddo, northwestern Kiowa, east central Greer and southwestern Canadian Counties through 200 PM CDT... At 110 PM CDT, the public reported strong thunderstorms producing a landspout along a line extending from 9 miles east of Hinton to near Granite. Movement was south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts and wind gusts up to 50 mph. At 1 PM CDT, a landspout was reported near Bridgeport, OK. SOURCE...Public. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... El Reno, Hobart, Hinton, Granite, Mountain View, Binger, Lone Wolf, Eakly, Gotebo, Lookeba, Rocky, Colony, Alfalfa, Cloud Chief, Fort Cobb Reservoir, Cedar Lake, Cowden, and Altus-Lugert Lake. This includes Interstate 40 between mile markers 108 and 116. LANDSPOUT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
